## Authors 

Emma F. Jones, Timothy C. Howton, Tabea M. Soelter, Brittany N. Lasseigne 

## Purpose 

The purpose of this project is to analyze cell-type specific patterns of alternative splicing in a rare neurodevelopmental disease model.
